## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fppassmanager">FPPassManager</a> manages BBPassManagers and FunctionPasses.

It batches all function passes and basic block pass managers together and sequence them to process one function at a time before processing next function.

Definition at line 457 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/legacypassmanagers-h">LegacyPassManagers.h</a>.

### runOnFunction() {#a0dec4e6b40dec12d8c6a17040ee73021}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool FPPassManager::runOnFunction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F)</>}>
run - Execute all of the passes scheduled for execution.

Execute all of the passes scheduled for execution by invoking runOnFunction method.

Keep track of whether any of the passes modifies the module, and if so, return true.

Keep track of whether any of the passes modifies the function, and if so, return true.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/legacypassmanagers-h/#l00464">464</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/legacypassmanagers-h">LegacyPassManagers.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/legacypassmanager-cpp/#l01364">1364</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/legacypassmanager-cpp">LegacyPassManager.cpp</a>.
